meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Kate Moriarty Faris Alikhan Elana Schor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7884.

td.p: Mary Kate Moriarty, a dentist from Dumfries, Virginia
Faris Alikhan, a speechwriter from Atlanta, Georgia
Elana Schor, a journalist from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,601)

tr.td: THE 12 DAYS OF CHRISTMAS SHOPPING LIST
GET IT STRAIT
WORDS FOR YOUR DOG
OTHER LONG-RUNNING TV SHOWS
"FIGHT" CLUB
SHAKESPEAREAN OPERA BY ARIA
